channel.title: Projects on Mudit Mittal
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mudit Mittal

item.title: Project 1
item.description: In this project i worked on creating a python web application using flask framework in python and deployed it on heroku servers. The data collected from the users was stored in a mysql database which was connected to the deployed application. The complete web application can be accessed using the following link: http://researchv3.herokuapp.com/ Keywords Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 2
item.description: Analyed text data using NLP library in python and created a bag of words. Cleaned the data using various methods under the NLP library. Created weightage of each sentence in the text data and based on that categorised them under different context categories. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 3
item.description: The project required me to work on Tableau to generate some useful insights from the dataset provided. I also performed Predictive Analytics using Python to predict the Annual Salary of the customers with the dataset provided. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 4
item.description: The project required me to work on Python to generate some useful insights from the dataset provided. I also performed Exploratory Data Analytics using Python to predict the performance of various cyptocurrencies in the world. Link to Github repository

item.title: Project 7
item.description: The project required me to work on Python to perform Exploratory Data Analysis and determine the hottest topics in machine learning. Link to Github repository
